Trade/Device Name(s): Glooko Device System for Glooko Application
Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Glooko Device System for Glooko Application enabling data download, management, and review of blood glucose readings from compatible meters to Android devices
Indications for Use Summary: Data management software intended to aid individuals with diabetes and healthcare professionals in the review, analysis, and evaluation of blood glucose readings to support diabetes management; connects to compatible FDA-cleared meters for transfer of blood glucose data to Android devices
